configuration.name: Issues by project/priority
configuration.query: select "priority_id", "issues"."project_id", count(*), priority."name", "projects"."name" from "issues" join "enumerations" priority on "priority_id" = priority."id" join "projects" on "issues"."project_id" = "projects"."id" group by "priority_id", "issues"."project_id"
